medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain in the epigastrum with associated nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days ago with abdominal pain, progressing to nausea and vomiting (8 episodes). Patient has never experienced these symptoms before. Last bowel movement was a day prior and normal in caliber.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Known history of H. pylori, underwent triple therapy, and has been on PPI since with no recurrent epigastric pain until yesterday. Past medical history includes a gastric ulcer, C-section, and trans-vaginal uterine fibroid removal.
medical_history.family_history: Non-contributory, no known history of colon cancer.
